product_name: The North Face Crowther Flannel Shirt - Men's
long_description: Pick up the Crowther Flannel Shirt from The North Face: You can never own too many durable and soft plaid shirts for working around the house or heading into town. 100% cotton flannel fabric is soft and warm to keep you comfortable throughout the fall and winter seasons. Side-seam gusset construction frees up your range of motion when you're chopping wood or working on your car. Chest pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Pick up the Crowther Flannel Shirt from The North Face: You can never own too many durable and soft plaid shirts for working around the house or heading into town.
